name: wg-easy
description: wg-easy packages WireGuard VPN with a modern web-based admin interface. It lets you create peers, manage keys, view QR codes, and monitor usage from a simple dashboard, making self-hosted VPN setup and maintenance much easier.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Configure and manage WireGuard VPN servers through an intuitive web interface

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Display QR codes for mobile devices to scan and connect instantly without manual configuration

features.title: Configuration Download
features.description: Download client configuration files for desktop or router setups

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Monitor upload and download statistics per peer to identify usage patterns

features.title: Peer Management
features.description: Enable, disable, or delete peers without restarting the VPN server
